dict.string: We need your location to show your position on the Camino map and provide weather data for your current location.
We need your location to track your progress on the Camino, even when the app is in the background.
Speech recognition is used to convert your spoken words to text for translation.
The microphone is used to capture your speech for the translator feature.
To enable live weather data, configure WeatherKit in your Apple Developer account and add the WeatherKit capability to this app.
